summary: A pathetic police chief, humiliated by everyone around him, suddenly wants a clean slate in life - and resorts to drastic means to do so.
cast: Philippe Noiret|Isabelle Huppert|Jean-Pierre Marielle|Stéphane Audran|Eddy Mitchell|Guy Marchand|Irène Skobline|Michel Beaune|Jean Champion|Victor Garrivier|Gérard Hernandez|Abdoulaye Diop|Daniel Langlet|François Perrot|Raymond Hermantier|Mamadou Dioumé|Samba Mané|Irénée Martin
keywords: scantily clad woman|woman in jeopardy|unhappy marriage|dysfunctional marriage|extramarital affair
title: Corrupción (1280 almas)
